amendment.description: Amendment sought to decrease Interdiction and Counter-Drug Activities funding and Andean Counter-Drug Initiative funding for Colombia by $61 million and increase funding for the Office for Domestic Preparedness by $34 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in the Congressional Record to increase the funding for the Office for Domestic Preparedness by $34 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McGovern amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 209 - 216 (Roll no. 106).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. McGovern.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McGovern amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 209 - 216 (Roll no. 106).
